/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast of nature and architecture. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements.
